txt.en: Seek out Hithlinn and tell him of your accomplishments.

'You should know, [placeholder], That I have long made a habit of observing the affairs of the younger folk of Middle Earth, but few tales have I seen unfurl such as yours. Through the many quests you have accomplished here within the Trollshaws over the past months, you have done much to aid secure the safety of Rivendell, and indeed of much of Arnor for the time being.

Such valor as yours is rare and much cherished amongst the Wise, for it reaches beyond the tip of your blade or the flight of your arrow and serves to inspire all who hear the tale of it - and that tale has spread wide as the wake of a great ship with your passage through these lands.

Stand tall, Child of the West, for you shall be asked to bear the standard of the free people in the dark days ahead, as the time fast approaches for us to relinquish it to those who will inherit these lands!'
Complete most quests within the Trollshaws.
Your efforts to help keep the valley of Rivendell hidden shall not go unrewarded.
